definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[רוח]] (√ of foll.; prob. breathe, blow (v. Gerber:46); cf. Syr. r0h. breathe; Ar. ra0h.a be windy; Eth. roh.a: flabello ventilare, ventulum facere; Ar. riyh.un breath, wind, spirit, ruwh.un soul, spirit; NH [[רוּחַ]], Aram. [[רוּחָא]], ruwh.o0 wind, breath, spirit; also NH [[רֵיחַ]], Aram. [[רֵיחָא]], riyh.o0, all odour; NH [[רִיחַ]], [[רוּחַ]] (usu. Hiph.), Targum Syr. Aph., all smell).
